name: routex
description: Simple router for Redux universal applications. Can be used with React too.

scripts.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:node: babel src --out-dir lib && babel node_modules/history/modules --out-dir node_modules/history/lib
scripts.build:umd: npm run build:umd:routex && npm run build:umd:react
scripts.build:umd:routex: webpack src/index.js dist/routex.js && NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/routex.min.js
scripts.build:umd:react: MODULENAME=react-routex webpack src/react/index.js dist/react-routex.js && NODE_ENV=production MODULE_NAME=react-routex webpack src/react/index.js dist/react-routex.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run clean && npm run build
